text: is a Japanese four-panel manga series by Sō Hamayumiba, serialized in Houbunsha's seinen manga magazine Manga Time Kirara Carat since November 2014. It has been collected in four tankōbon volumes. An anime television series adaptation by Feel premiered on October 12, 2020. ==Characters== ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ; : ==Media== ===Manga=== ===Anime=== The 12-episode anime television series adaptation was announced in the May issue of Manga Time Kirara Carat on March 28, 2019. The series is animated by Feel and directed by Keiichiro Kawaguchi, with Kawaguchi and Tatsuya Takahashi handling series composition, and Sumie Kinoshita designing the characters. Monaca is composing the series' music. It was set to premiere in July 2020, but has been delayed to October 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The series premiered on October 12, 2020 on AT-X and other channels. Funimation acquired the series, and will stream it on its website in North America and the British Isles, and on AnimeLab in Australia and New Zealand. Hiyori Nitta, Risa Kubota, Haruka Shiraishi, Reina Kondō, and Kyōka Moriya perform the opening theme song "Kibō Darake no Everyday!", as well as the ending theme song "Wonder!" as their characters. {|class="plainrowheaders wikitable" style="width:98%; margin:auto; background:#FFF;" |- style="border-bottom: 3px solid #CCF;" ! ! title: Dropout Idol Fruit Tart
